sentences.sContent: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.
sentences.sCn: 魔术师从帽子里变出一只兔子来。

synos.tran: 想象；念咒召唤；用魔法变出
以念咒召唤神灵；施魔法，变魔术

phrases.pCn: 想起，使在脑海中显现；用魔法召唤

remMethod.val: con(共同) + jur(诅咒) + e → 共同诅咒 → (念咒)召唤

trans.tranCn: 变魔术， 变戏法； 召唤
trans.tranOther: to perform clever tricks in which you seem to make things appear, disappear, or change by magic
